body.name: GPS Car Tracker for Vehicles-Easy Plug & Play Install-Speed Monitoring-Text Alert-Geofence-Custom Reporting-Route History No Activation Fee-Cancel Anytime-OBD Tracker - Subscription Required!
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 30 mins
features: ENSURE SAFETY OF YOUR LOVED ONES: Monitor your kids and vehicle with our car tracker device. Our vehicle tracker creates Geofences that alert you when your vehicle enters or exits defined areas. Our car tracking device also monitors the length of time your car was in the area.

MONITOR DRIVING BEHAVIOR: Our OBD II car tracking device detector also runs reports on excessive speeding, harsh acceleration, turning, all stops, total time, and mileage driven. With these features, our GPS tracker for cars can help monitor your personal driving behavior, your kids, and other loved ones using the same car or vehicle.

TRACK REAL-TIME SURVEILLANCE: Maintain surveillance over your vehicle or commercial fleet with our GPS tracker for cars. Our portable GPS tracker will send alerts when your car is on the move. With Brickhouse Security GPS car tracker, you can have peace of mind that your car and valuables are safe.

EASY TO INSTALL: Our car tracker device can be simply plugged into the OBD II port under the dashboard of any car. No professional installation and batteries are needed. The subscription for our tracker also offers three (3) plans to choose from Annual, Quarterly, or Monthly. Our mini GPS tracker can be the ideal choice for monitoring the location of your loved ones or assets.

AFFORDABLE SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS: Choose from 3 affordable plans for as low as $17.99 a month. $17.99 (BASIC), $27.99 (PLUS), or $34.99 (PREMIUM). You can go monthly, quarterly, or annually depending on your preference. No contracts, cancel anytime for a hassle-free experience. Our tracking device includes a Spark Nano 7.0 wall charger, a user's guide, and a pre-installed SIM card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest Way to Manage Your Assets
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic device! Web interface easy to use. The app is great for remote monitoring. You can get text alerts, emails, and/or notifications on your mobile device if one of your vehicles is speeding, moving during non-work hours, outside of their area, or in an area that is restricted / off limits.This device is not going to give you 100%, second by second placement of your trucks. Your vehicle may move two blocks before it registers movement & you may miss a notification that it left the geofence that you've made around your company parking lot.However, very easy to train up your fleet manager or other newbie on how to write custom alerts, add new vehicles, et cetera.Worth the investment to protect your equipment and your company's reputation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great, Very Accurate
reviews.reviewText: This device is very easy to use and the only installation required is pugging it in. It’s ready to go out of the box. The App is very user friendly also. I am very satisfied with my purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work great. Slight learning curve for software
reviews.reviewText: I liked how simple the install was. If you have replaced a better or used a obd scan tool you can install these devices easily. Directions are clear and easy to follow. Customer service is top notch and Trish was especially helpful with my issue dealing with multiple devices and accounts. I highly recommend this for fleet or peace of mind. Items are very discreet and easy to tuck away from view.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Expensive app doesn't tell you much unless you pay extra extras was laggy and inconsistent on data. Bought for my son as he's a New driver. I wish I would sent It back we now use life 360 . 360 is way more responsive and accurate. And always with them as long as they have their phone too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product for the price, did not know a monthly cost was also there.
reviews.reviewText: Product is simple to install on the car has blinking lights that I taped and painted black over.uses a internet service to track on your screen. also has a memory chip and may have a memory only option not sure. Since it has a 29$ or so monthly charge I may not use it that much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Customer Service! Device work great!
reviews.reviewText: Plugged Device into my vehicle (2019 Toyota Camry) and set up a new account with Brick House Security and was able to track my vehicle that was being driven by my daughter right away and the location was accurate. Paid for a yearly membership by mistake and Sam with Brick House Security helped me get a refund right away and was able to change my membership to monthly. Sam provided great customer service, I am impressed with the device and the customer service that I received from Brick House Security customer service department. Thank you Sam!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is easy to use, the app is simple and laid out well. The website can be a little tricky. Over all this is a great easy product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not thrilled with the “free 2months”
reviews.reviewText: We got this to try it out and you have to pay for your “free month” up front..infuriating. Setting up the device was simple, but the monthly cost is pretty steep. We will be returning and getting a refund.

reviews.reviewTitle: So far it works as expected
reviews.reviewText: I use it to monitor my cars and drivers; I think overall it works good; for the most accurate trip details car needs to be put in parkGot assistance from Julius Goyal after my first tracker got bad and he worked to replace it immediately and I have had no problems with the new one
Aún no lo utilizo pero me llego abierto
GPS is as advertised. Easy installation and the app is easy to maneuver. It is a subscription as others have stated but it works as advertised.

This device worked okay for about two weeks. Then I put it in another vehicle and it reported one one-way trip and stopped working for four days. I removed it and put it back in the same car and it reported one one-way trip and stopped working for two more days. I put the device in yet another car and it never reported its movements. Then I contacted support, they re-established connection and told me to drive it around to see if it worked. I advised Brickhouse that if they didn't fix anything, I expected the same thing to happen again so what was the cause? They said weak cell signal. This seems very unlikely as the travel was in an urban setting in Saskatoon, Canada but, even if it was, the technology need to be capable of re-establishing tracking when cell signal improves. I think Brickhouse Security needs to take their product back to the lab and get it functioning more robustly in real life applications. Very disappointed in this product and the service response.
The Accuracy, Battery Life, and Easy to use
